exceptions.tactic: apply (sem_split V W K w (s1 \+ s1') (s2 \+ s2') s1 s1' s2 s2' z) in Hstep.

original: intros Hcoh1 Hcoh2 Hstep. apply (sem_split V W K w (s1 \+ s1') (s2 \+ s2') s1 s1' s2 s2' z) in Hstep. - destruct Hstep as [[HstepW Hw_eq] | [HstepV Hs1_eq]]. + split. * apply HstepW. * subst. apply Idle. split; auto. apply: coh_split; eauto. + split. * apply: Idle. split; auto. * apply HstepV. - apply coh_split in Hcoh1. destruct Hcoh1 as [s1a [s1b [Hcoh1a Hcoh1b]]]. apply coh_split in Hcoh2. destruct Hcoh2 as [s2a [s2b [Hcoh2a Hcoh2b]]]. exists s1 s1', s2, s2'. repeat split; try auto.
